title: ziggs  W indicator is missing
body: ziggs  W indicator is missing,  would never get fixxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

If everything goes as planned, this should be fixed next patch. :]

Hi, can you look at my issue? This is a serious bug and it seems you are not going to respond to it.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/EZ9ljakg-gameplay-quick-cast-with-indicator-bug
Thank you!

This isn't something I know much about, but I'd be happy to pass it to the team who would. :]

(I usually don't respond to posts where I don't have an answer, but rather, pass it on to the team who may have a better idea of what's going on and how to fix it).
I am glad that Riot responds to me so quickly. This bug has influenced the gaming experience of the players for several patches. I cannot believe that no one reports it.
